subject: Hello Friend
body:
Hello Friend
 
Good News for you, it's been a while
 
How are you and your family doing ?
 
I want you to know that I finally succeeded in getting out the cash boxes into the USA
I have deposited $2.5m as your compensation for all your assistance trying to help get out the cash to a safe location all these years. 
 
Quickly contact CBI WALLET with your full names , and they will open your wallet and fund you immediately as I have instructed. You will receive this compensation payment in crypto-currency from CBI Wallet Company. Therefore, Contact CBI Wallet official as below.
CBI WALLET
Contact Name : Mr. P C. Ming
Email : 
officemailforgood@gmail.com
 
Yours Sincerely,
 
Mr. P C. Ming

subject: Re:    Hello Friend
body:
Hello Mr. C. Ming,

Wow, that's some news! I'm glad to hear you've managed to get the cash boxes into the USA. My family and I are doing well, thank you for asking.

I'm curious about this CBI Wallet though. Can you tell me more about it? How does it work exactly? And how did you come across this company?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Amanda
